creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, orange, blue, purple; pounded indigo; lower half is three embroidered panels; all diamond-shaped designs, separated by red/white edging; all black upper half with thin braided cord; ties at waist; four thin lines of embroidery on upper half
title: Skirt, from a three-piece set
